sn43.15:1.1: Saccañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi saccagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.16:1.1: Pārañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi pāragāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.17:1.1: Nipuṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi nipuṇagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.18:1.1: Sududdasañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi sududdasagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.19:1.1: Ajajjarañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi ajajjaragāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.20:1.1: Dhuvañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi dhuvagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.21:1.1: Apalokitañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi apalokitagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.22:1.1: Anidassanañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anidassanagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.23:1.1: Nippapañcañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi nippapañcagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.24:1.1: Santañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi santagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.25:1.1: Amatañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi amatagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.26:1.1: Paṇītañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi paṇītagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.27:1.1: Sivañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi sivagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.28:1.1: Khemañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi khemagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.29:1.1: Taṇhākkhayañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi taṇhākkhayagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.30:1.1: Acchariyañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi acchariyagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.31:1.1: Abbhutañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi abbhutagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.32:1.1: Anītikañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anītikagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.33:1.1: Anītikadhammañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anītikadhammagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.34:1.1: Nibbānañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi nibbānagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.35:1.1: Abyābajjhañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi abyābajjhagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.36:1.1: Virāgañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi virāgagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.37:1.1: Suddhiñca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi suddhigāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.37:1.2: Taṃ suṇātha. Katamā ca, bhikkhave, suddhi …pe…. (26)
sn43.38:1.1: Muttiñca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi muttigāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.38:1.2: Taṃ suṇātha. Katamā ca, bhikkhave, mutti …pe…. (27)
sn43.39:1.1: Anālayañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anālayagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.39:1.2: Taṃ suṇātha. Katamo ca, bhikkhave, anālayo …pe…. (28)
sn43.40:1.1: Dīpañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi dīpagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.41:1.1: Leṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi leṇagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.42:1.1: Tāṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi tāṇagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43.43:1.1: Saraṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi saraṇagāmiñca maggaṃ.
